author: PlayStation
description:
CD PROJEKT RED and Epic Games come together at the State of Unreal to show an early development Unreal Engine 5 tech demo for The Witcher 4 — showcasing some of the innovative technology and features that will help bring the game’s open world to life. Keep in mind this isn’t gameplay of The Witcher 4 itself, but a deep dive into the technological foundation of the new Witcher saga.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Witcher 4 - Unreal Engine 5 Tech Demo | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014070

The nimble rogue Cider joins the heroes of Talamh in their quest to return magic to the world in Absolum, an original roguelite beat ‘em up by Dotemu, available on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 later this year.

An enigmatic fusion of human and construct, carefully rebuilt from near death by a mysterious puppeteer, Cider joins the fray with acrobatic aerial attacks, an extensible arm, and an arsenal of mechanical weapons to wreak havoc among Sun King Azra's lackeys!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Absolum - Cider Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1435-PPSA28820_00-NEVERSENDPS50000

Never's End is a turn-based tactical RPG where you return from death into the midst of a global cataclysm. Possess townsfolk to use them as living weapons, wield the forces of nature to reshape the battlefield, and lead mankind back from the brink of extinction.

Wishlist now on PS5!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Never's End - Announce Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Two epic stories. One remastered journey.

Anima Gate of Memories I&II Remaster brings together two acclaimed action RPGs in a single, enhanced edition — with improved visuals, refined gameplay, and unforgettable choices.

Discover a fantasy world of memories and war in the shadows. Whether you're a longtime fan or diving in for the first time, this is the ultimate Anima experience.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Anima Gate of Memories I&II Remaster - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
State of Play returns June 4! Watch live for news and updates on must-play games coming to PS5. The show highlights a selection of great games from creators across the globe.

The 40+ minute show begins June 4 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST | June 5 at 6am JST on YouTube and Twitch, and will be broadcast in English and Japanese. See you then!
Regarding co-streaming and video-on-demand (VOD)

Please note that this broadcast may include copyrighted content (e.g. licensed music) that PlayStation does not control. We welcome and celebrate our amazing co-streamers and creators, but licensing agreements outside our control could interfere with co-streams or VOD archives of this broadcast. If you’re planning to save this broadcast as a VOD to create recap videos, or to repost clips or segments from the show, we advise omitting any copyrighted music.

#ps5games
title: State of Play | June 4, 2025 [English Subs]

author: PlayStation
description:
「State of Play」が 6月5日に放送決定！PS5に発売予定の注目タイトルに関する最新情報とアップデートを、ライブ配信でご覧いただけます。番組内では、世界中のクリエイターが手がけた選りすぐりのゲームをご紹介します。

この40分を超える本番組は、 6月5日午前6時 (日本時間) にYouTubeとTwitchで放送予定。英語と日本語でご覧いただけます。お楽しみに！
同時配信およびビデオオンデマンド (VOD) について

本番組にはPlayStationが管理していない著作権保護されたコンテンツ（使用許諾を受けた音楽など）が含まれることにご注意ください。私たちは、素晴らしい同時配信者やクリエイターの皆さんを歓迎していますが、私たちの管理外にあるライセンス契約が本番組の同時ストリーミングやVODアーカイブに干渉する可能性があります。本番組をVODとして保存し、振り返り動画の作成や番組のクリップの一部をリポストすることをお考えの場合、著作権で保護された音楽をすべて削除することを推奨します。

#ps5games
title: State of Play | June 4, 2025 [Japanese]

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014077

RoboCop has Unfinished Business and it starts close to home with an attack on the Metro West Precinct.
 
After which, RoboCop will find himself scaling the OmniTower, a housing project turned death trap as he battles his way to the top in order to protect himself and the citizens of Old Detroit.
 
During this climb, you'll be aided by new characters and butting heads against people with ties to Murphy's past.
 
RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business launches July 17th. Pre-purchase now to get the Prime Directives Pack.

#ps5 #ps5games #robocoproguecity 

Rated Mature
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business - Character Intro Video | PS5 Games
